title: Too Good to Be True
overview: Rachel is a single mum with a young son, Liam. They're on the poverty line, and Rachel works all hours of the day as a cleaner to provide for her boy. One day, her boss is approached by a businesswoman, Simone, who acts for an extremely wealthy client called Elliot. Simone offers Rachel a new job: better pay, shorter hours. It sounds too good to be trueâ€¦
